notes: SUMMARY: Madam Sud (Sanjak) plays Dillon Kane, Pat Ryan, Connie, Terry and Stoop against Baron de Plexus. The Baron plans to fly Chinese ex-warlords and their gold out of China for a fee, then steal the gold. Sanjak plans to steal the gold from the Baron. To be continued.
